app.title: DISC Personality Assessment
app.description: Discover your behavioral style and communication preferences

hero.title: Discover Your DISC Profile
hero.subtitle: Understand your behavioral style and improve your relationships

about.title: What is DISC?
about.description: DISC is a behavioral assessment tool based on the DISC theory of psychologist William Marston. It focuses on four personality traits: Dominance, Influence, Steadiness, and Compliance.

intro.title: DISC Assessment
intro.description: This assessment consists of questions about your behavior in various situations. There are no right or wrong answers - just select the option that best describes you.
intro.instructions: Please answer honestly for the most accurate results.

errors.required: Please answer this question before continuing
errors.name_required: Please enter your name to start the test

results.title: Your DISC Profile
results.summary: Based on your responses, we've identified your behavioral style. Here's how you relate to others and approach situations.

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: Here's your personalized DISC certificate. You can download it as a JPEG file to share or keep for your records.

certificate.title: DISC Profile Certificate
certificate.subtitle: Personality Assessment Results
certificate.completed: Completed the DISC personality assessment on
certificate.disclaimer: This certificate represents results from a self-assessment tool and should be considered in context.

errors.language_unavailable: Language resources unavailable. Defaulting to English.
errors.loading_failed: Failed to load content. Please try again.
